'''It's Bigger on the Inside''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the quest ''[[The Realm Within]].''

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name is a reference to the show {{w|Doctor Who}}. "It's bigger on the inside" is a sentence used several times to describe the {{w|TARDIS}}.
